articles.author: Tushar Kelshikar
articles.title: Mahindra BE.05 electric SUV teased; gets a panoramic glass roof - Team-BHP
articles.description: Mahindra recently showcased the Global Pik Up and Thar.e concept at an event in South Africa. The carmaker also gave us a sneak peek at a pre-production prototype of the BE.05 electric SUV. The teaser image shared by the company gives us a bird's-eye view of …
articles.content:
